channel.title: The Paranormal Cafe
channel.description: This is the ORIGINAL Paranormal Cafe, hosted by Rob Simcox. The Paranormal Cafe has been broadcasting live since September 2005. Rob founded Black Horse Paranormal Research in 1993 and has done numerous investigations into paranormal activity and psychic phenomenon. Rob has appeared on Television shows such as Philly After Midnight, It's Your Call with Lynn Doyle, and has been profiled in print media as well. In addition to free-wheeling open forum shows, The Paranormal Cafe features guests who's studies include: Paranormal Investigations, UFO's, Cryptozoology, Reverse Speech, Dream Therapy, Ancient Manuscripts, Space Travel, Hauntings, Nostradamus's Prophecies, and more. With a mixture of intellectual discourse and humorous interactions, we're sure that you'll enjoy every episode! We welcome your questions and comments. Email us at: cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Listen, Talk, Wonder.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe Broadcast July 22nd 2011 - First Hour
item.description: Here we present the first hour of 7-22-2011 of The Paranormal Cafe. We chat about the new way of recording the show so it sounds better for the listener. We also discuss Podomatic and their new way of manipulating the ranking system to include obscure statistic that have no bearing on a broadcast or podcast. I hope you enjoy the installment and invite you to listen to all our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com You can also subscribe through itunes for Free! I also want to thank those who have been reposting these interviews on their own Facebook pages and the like. Lindsey, Sri, and others, it is greatly appreciated. If you want to drop me an email please do so at mycafe@juno.com Thank you for stopping by and hope you enjoy.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe Broadcast - June 16th 2011 - Intreview w/ Bob Gardner of MUFON - 2nd Hour
item.description: Here is the second hour of broadcast from The Paranormal Cafe Radio Show on June 16th 2011. Here we interview Bob Gardner on the latest happenings in MUFON. item.title: The Paranormal Cafe broadcast from 5.17.2011 3rd hour
item.description: Here is the final hour of the broadcast of The Paranormal Cafe. Here Rob discusses some more articles from weird news and takes phone calls. Regular caller Pete from Newark calls in and discusses the interview with Drew Maras and recent goings on with Arnold Schwarzenegger. It's worth the listen as Rob and Pete converse. Host Notes: Pete is one of the best callers to the show in that his content and his conversation is really thought provoking. He's a fun guy to talk with and I love hearing from him. I hope you enjoy the installment and invite you to listen to all our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com You can also subscribe through itunes for Free! I also want to thank those who have been reposting these interviews on their own Facebook pages and the like. Denise Linsey, Sri Savoor, Pete and Brenda Denesowicz, along with others. It is greatly appreciated. If you want to drop me an email please do so at mycafe@juno.com Thank you for stopping by and hope you enjoy.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe interviews Author Drew Maras, 5.17.2011 2nd hour
item.description: The Paranormal Cafe welcomes Drew Maras Author of Open Your Eyes: To 2012 and Beyond. www.openyoureyesto2012andbeyond.com In the interview Drew talks about the coming Mayan predictions and the coinciding prophecies. Drew also discusses the governments role and NASA, along with ancient astronauts. Host Notes: I appreciate Drew offering up his research on the topics and discussing the information. I hope you enjoy the episode and encourage you to listen and download all of the episodes of The Paranormal Cafe. You can subscribe through ITunes and get every episode. You can email Rob at mycafe@juno.com Thanks Mom.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe welcomes back James Penniston and John Burroughs.
item.description: James Penniston and John Burroughs return to The Paranormal Cafe to discuss the latest developments in The Rendlesham Forest case. What are codes? What about the 30th year anniversary with "Return to Rendlesham" Conference. Here Rob asks them about their return to the forest that is burned into their minds for eternity. This case has stood the test of time and still consistantly debated. Rob also asks about the new information in regards to the "Codes". Listen to Jim talk about the codes, and the evolution of the investigation into them. Host notes: I am glad these guys agreed to come onto the show and discuss further the case. This is one for the ages. Thank you Jim and John, you are most welcome here. I hope you enjoy the episode and encourage you to listen and download all of the episodes of The Paranormal Cafe. You can subscribe through ITunes and get every episode, free. You can email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom.

item.title: Mississippi UFO Conference April 16th 2011 - Pat Frascogna
item.description: Here is the organizer of the first Mississippi UFO Conference www.msufo.com in Jackson Mississippi, at the Jackson Convention Complex on April 16th 2011 - Pat Frascogna. pat@msufo.com The event is titled From Roswell to Rendlesham. The guests are Top-Notch and are, Darren Dedo John Burroughs Jim Penniston Linda Moulton Howe Tom Carey This is a guest list that has a no-nonsense approach to it. With ticket prices starting at $5, that's right five bucks! You get more than your money's worth with this one! A must attend! Enjoy, and even if you can't attend, drop Pat a line to show your support, he will appreciate it! Enjoy!

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe - March 8th 2011. Debut broadcast on WPAZ 1370 AM - Third Hour Hour Pt .3 of 3 Interview w/ Richard Sherman on Bible Codes
item.description: Here is the third and final hour of the debut broadcast on WPAZ 1370 AM Pottstown. Here Rob interviews Richard Sherman. www.biblecodedigest.com He discusses Bible Codes and the probability factors. Host Notes: I have always been facinated by Bible Codes and how they are found. I understand the controversy here but I think we have only scratched the surface here and someday technology will catch up with this phenomenon and we will be able to use it far more effectively. I hope you enjoy the episode and encourage you to listen and download all of the episodes of The Paranormal Cafe. You can subscribe through ITunes and get every episode. You can email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom.

item.title: Leslie Kean Awarded Book Of The Year 2010!
item.description: Bestselling Author Leslie Kean Author of UFOs - Generals, Pilots, and Government Officials Go On The Record. www.ufosontherecord.com She stops into The Paranormal Cafe and updates us on the latest happenings to her and the book! She discusses the recent developments for The History Channel and her involvement in it. Leslie has distinguished herself as one of the highest caliber researchers in the world. The book is second to none and it shows in content and quality. Host Notes: Listen for me spring the news to Leslie about her book being selected as The Paranormal Cafe's choice of Book Of The Year 2010. It is well deserving and she accepts it with class. Thank you Leslie for all your hard work.

item.title: Hear the Rob Simcox interview as a guest on The Gut N Bone Show!
item.description: Here's a change of pace for you. Robert is invited on The Gut N Bone Show, www.gutwrench.podomatic.com for a live interview. The host Robby Bradbury asks Rob a wide range of questions and you may not be ready for the answers you hear. These are things that Rob doesn't talk about all the time on the radio. Rob gets into the origin of the show and the basis of himself and the show in this interview. Listen for Rob talk about his influence, his Mother, and how that helped shape his curiosity and longing for more. Host Notes: This was a very cool interview with Robby. I thank him for inviting me to share his broadcast time. He is a stand up host and I appreciate the host banter that only hosts can have, give and take. I am heavily honored by Robby when his introduction states that I was an influence on him. Wow! I thank him very much and hope I can continue to do so. I hope you enjoy me being on the other side of the microphone. Let me know what you think, email me at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom!

item.title: Brad Meltzer from Decoded on The History Channel is Robs guest on The Paranormal Cafe!
item.description: The Paranormal Cafe welcomes Best Selling Author Brad Meltzer of The History Channels brand new show DECODED! Brad discusses the show with Rob and they go into detail on the team assembled for the series. Brad shares some behind the scene details from the show as well. Brad discusses his personal views on the premier episode and discuss details important to the missing cornerstones of The White House, and The Capital. Host Notes: I want to thank Brad for his insights and his time in The Cafe. He shares some personal stories about his parents and his family that I find very endearing. Brad is very meticulous on his work and it shows in his frank discussions. I think The History Channel has "Raised The Bar" in producing this series and I can't get enough of it. It comes out swinging and keeps swinging until the final moments of the show. If you like a good mystery that delivers on substance, then Brad Meltzer's DECODED is the series for you. I invite you to listen and enjoy. We also invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Thursdays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: Leslie Kean visits The Paranormal Cafe to discuss her new book, UFOs- Generals,Pilots,And Government Officials Go On The Record.
item.description: The Paranormal Cafe welcomes one of the premier investigators of our time, Leslie Kean. www.ufosontherecord.com She openly discusses with Rob many of the well documented cases of UFO sigtings and occurances. Rob asks questions about some of the more well known cases, Rendlesham Forest. Leslie talks about some of the lesser known cases profiled in the book. She thanks her contributors and talks about the differences between the US Government versus foriegn govenments handling of UFO cases. Host Notes: There are but a few of "Must Haves" when it comes to books dealing of this subject. UFOs - Generals,Pilots, And Government Officials Go On The Record. is certainly one of these. If you were to only get one book this year, I would have to recommend this one. It is a masterpiece that flies in the face of "If only someone with credibility would come forward about their UFO sigtings and go on the record" Well it seems so many have and you have them all in one place. I am so happy for Leslie and her book being on The New York Times Bestsellers List. She has earned her respect and will have mine eternally. I hope you enjoy the discussions and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook. A special thanks to you who have been posting the podcast feed on your own Facebook, Myspace, ect. pages. It is very much appreciated and I am humbled. Thank you.

item.title: The Colonel Charles Halt Tape Recording made at Rendlesham 12.26.1980. MP3
item.description: Here is the recording made by Colonel Charles Halt at Rendlesham the morning of December 26th 1980. This is the complete recording that was made by him and has been discussed at great lengths in ufo and non ufo circles. Listen to the unedited tape for yourself and hear in detail Col. Halt's own words, while it's happenning. I have posted this because of the many emails I received asking for the complete tape. Please note: Listen for around 2:22 where you here a bar or two of piano music. This is where Col. Halt discussed on The Paranormal Cafe that he had accidentally moved the switch on the recorder to record, while the tape was in and inadvertantly recorded about a second of his daughter's recital. A tid bit I find interesting. Listen for yourself and decide!

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe interviews Col. Charles Halt and Mr. John Burroughs. 7-30-10 Pt. 2
item.description: This is the conclusion of the interview. Description of show as follows. Here are two of the pivotal witnesses in the incident at RAF Bentwaters. Col. Halt was investigating the landing site of the UFO and was using his personal recorder to document the site. While recording him and his team then witnessed their own UFO's and documented them as well. His recording has become legendary in the UFO field and I find him an unwilling participant in all this. John Burroughs was the only witness to be present at BOTH the first nights incident with James Penniston, and the second night with Halt. Rob interviews Col. Halt and Mr. Burroughs about their incidents and delves into the tape itself. This is an interview that is a must hear for anyone interested in the Bentwaters UFO incidents. Host Notes: Listen for Col. Halt discuss the back story of how the story got out. You can hear his distain for some of those involved and his honesty in his thoughts and actions. I was surprised at his candor and his willingness to discuss this case with me. I also liked Mr. Burroughs reactions to all the incident and think I can identify with what was going on in his head and what he was trying to accomplish by voluntarily going out into Rendlesham on the second night. I find the Gentlemen to be stand up individuals that have had to deal with a horrible situation that they had no choice but to deal with. Listen to their story in their own words and then ask yourself, "Would I have acted the same?" Please note that this interview was performed less than 2 weeks prior to the BBC "Hit Piece" by Evan Davis. I thank both of these Gentlemen for coming on and invite them back anytime to discuss whatever they would wish. I hope you enjoy the discussions and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook. A special thanks to you who have been posting the podcast feed on your own Facebook, Myspace, ect. pages. It is very much appreciated and I am humbled. Thank you.

item.title: Interview with Mr. James Penniston & Mr. John Burroughs in response to BBC Hit Piece on Bentwaters.
item.description: Here we interview recent guests on The Paranormal Cafe, James Penniston and John Burroughs regarding the recent BBC Article by Evan Davis (unreachable), "The Truth Is Not Out There" with contributions by Ian Ridpath (invited, declined)and Mark Pilkington (invited,declined). Rob reads the article and allows both gentlemen to respond to the obvious "Hit Piece" from the BBC. They discuss this recent attack and talk about the obvious flaws in the "Investigation" by Davis. Rob chimes in with what his thoughts on it is and invites you to come to your own conclusion. Host Notes: I'm glad I was able to get these gentlemen on the show so quickly and thank them for their candor. I really found the piece by Mr. Davis ridiculous and think most others will too. I really wanted to allow these gentlemen their time to address the article in their own words and say what was on their mind. Thank you Mr. Penniston and Mr. Burroughs very much. Your always welcome. I hope you enjoy the discussions and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook. item.itunes:summary: Here we interview recent guests on The Paranormal Cafe, James Penniston and John Burroughs regarding the recent BBC Article by Evan Davis (unreachable), "The Truth Is Not Out There" with contributions by Ian Ridpath (invited, declined)and Mark Pilkington (invited,declined). Rob reads the article and allows both gentlemen to respond to the obvious "Hit Piece" from the BBC. They discuss this recent attack and talk about the obvious flaws in the "Investigation" by Davis. Rob chimes in with what his thoughts on it is and invites you to come to your own conclusion. Host Notes: I'm glad I was able to get these gentlemen on the show so quickly and thank them for their candor. I really found the piece by Mr. Davis ridiculous and think most others will too. I really wanted to allow these gentlemen their time to address the article in their own words and say what was on their mind. Thank you Mr. Penniston and Mr. Burroughs very much. Your always welcome. I hope you enjoy the discussions and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays 6 pm. item.title: Celeste Mattia calls into the Paranormal Cafe!
item.description: We were very happy to have Celeste Mattia www.celestemattia.com @ email at celestemattia@comcast.net and phone at 610.446.7726 Psychic/Medium/Astrologer/Tarot Card Reader call into the Paranormal Cafe. Rob discusses many things astrologically and more of current events with Celeste. Celeste even gives a little insight to Rob about Libras and discusses the current positions of the planets. Host Notes: Celeste is my most requested guest on the air and I am very honored to have her on. I find Celeste very refreshing and she always seems to have a "Glass Half Full" optimism about her. I have recommended her many many times, and have had many people not only become lifelong clients, but lifelong friends as well. She is one of the most genuine people I have ever been privledged to have met and hope you'll enjoy the show. I hope you enjoy the discussion and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook. item.title: The Paranormal Cafe Welcomes Mr. James Penniston. Eyewitness to Bentwaters UFO Incident.
item.description: We gladly welcome Mr. Penniston to the Cafe. Rob interviews Jim about his first hand account of his experiences at RAF Bentwaters, on December 26th 1980. Jim came up close and too close for comfort with his investigation into what he describes as a ship that landed in Rendlesham Forest. Listen to Jim in his own words tell what happened that fateful night. This incident changed Jim and has never left him since. Would you have acted as he did? Would your life change forever if you were in Rendlesham Forest that night? Listen and wonder for yourself. Host notes: When I host this show I have many different experiences talking with guests. Some interviews go well, some not so much. When I started this show 5 years ago I had my "Bucket list" of guests I would like to interview. Jim was at the top of the list. I have been looking forward to it for several years now. The interview went better than could be expected. Jim is a gentleman who brings a lot of class, and an honest talk to the listener and myself that really sews up why I ever wanted to do this in the first place. I wanted the listener to hear for themselves straight from those who had experienced it. Unfiltered. That's what you get here. Jim tells it as he saw it and lets you make up your own mind. Refreshing. Thank you Mr. Penniston, it is greatly appreciated. I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM now on Fridays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook. A special thanks to you who have been posting the podcast feed on your own Facebook, Myspace, ect. pages. It is very much appreciated and I am humbled. It helps spread the word even faster. Thank you.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe interview with International UFO Investigator Richard Dolan. 12.01.09
item.description: Here is the interview with Richard Dolan www.keyholepublishing.com about his latest, and highly anticipated book, The Cover-Up Exposed, 1973-1991. This is the second book in a trilogy where the first book, UFOs and the National Security State: An Unclassified History, 1941-1973 was one for the ages. I have read his first book and am very much looking forward to the second. We have Jennifer Stein www.mainlinemufon.com calling in to talk about Richard's work as well. A little on Richard, Richard Dolan was born in Brooklyn, New York, studied at Alfred University and Oxford University, was a finalist for a Rhodes scholarship, and completed his graduate work in history at the University of Rochester. Prior to his interest in UFOs, Dolan studied U.S. Cold War strategy, Soviet history and culture, and international diplomacy. In 2000, he published UFOs and the National Security State: An Unclassified History, 1941-1973 (republished in 2002 with the subtitle Chronology of a Cover-Up, 1941-1973). This 500-page history provides clear detail on the major UFO cases of the early Cold War era, the attitudes and policies toward UFOs by the military and intelligence community, and the fascinating development of the citizen movements to end UFO secrecy. In 2009, Richard completed Volume Two of his historical study, subtitled The Cover-Up Exposed, 1973-1991, and is now at work on the final volume of his historical trilogy. I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Tuesdays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe interviews Author Bobby McGehee! April 27th 2010.
item.description: Here we interview Author Bobby McGehee bnmcgehee@juno.com about his new book Model Of The Universe. http://newuniversetheory.com/ In this interview Rob talks with Mr. McGehee about his findings that The Big Bang theory, is just that, A Theory. Mr. McGehee puts forth that this is NOT consistant with the data and his books shows this to be the case. Rob brings up current theories (Dr. Alan Guth's Inflation Theory)about the universe and the problems with them. Hear why the Big Bang was not even a small pop! Host Notes: I like what Bobby is saying here. He is unafraid to be challenged and even encourages us to think for ourselves. I've always had nagging doubts about the Big Bang and, until now, I thought I was alone. Listen to Bobby and his findings and get over to buy his book at http://www.authorhouse.com look up McGehee and you will find his books available. Thank you Mr. McGehee for your time and I wish you all the luck in the galaxies! I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Tuesdays 6 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe April 6th 2010, Interview with Author/Alien Abductee, Jim Moroney.
item.description: In this broadcast Rob interviews Jim Moroney, Writer of the new book- The Extraterrestrial Answer Book. www.aufosg.com Jim Moroney has over 25 years of experience in UFO research and is an accomplished public speaker. A grounded highly proficient professional educator and international speaker, he has captivated audiences with his personal experiences and his insight into the UFO phenomenon. A formal education in science, transpersonal psychology and health and safety, Jim Moroney is the author of the “New Bridge” and manages the Alberta UFO Website. Jim is the full-time Executive Director for the Alberta Municipal Health and Safety Association and instructs health and safety and occupational hygiene courses part-time at the University of Calgary. He has also instructed at the Northern Alberta Institute of Technology and University of Alberta Jim comes to the cafe and shares his experiences with everyone about his abduction experiences. Host notes: I enjoyed this interview with Jim and appreciate his candor. The book brings a fresh outlook on the subject and covers much more that just the abductions. I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Tuesdays from 6 to 8 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at www.wche1520.com You can also email Rob at mycafe@juno.com Thanks Mom Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: Cafe Broadcast on 07.31.09 Interview w/ Bradley Lockerman on his new movie The John Searl Story.
item.description: We have been getting enormous responses to this show to get it on as soon as possible and here it is. In this broadcast Rob interviews Bradley Lockerman, Writer and Director of the new movie- The John Searl Story. www.johnsearlstory.com Bradley comes to the Cafe asking us only one thing. Is it possible to have the solution to the energy crisis and anti-gravidic flight all in one solution? Bradley invites you to see for yourself. Rob interviews him about his movie and they go into detail about the life of Mr. John Searl. Host notes: I have watched many movies about unexplained phenomenon, this is by far the very best! Bradley takes you to meet the man and learn from him, in his own words, his invention! I like what Bradley has done here. He has invited you to make up your own mind and research for yourself. He does not lead you to a predetermined conclusion, but to come up with your own. He let the movie, be John Searl. I highly recommend this movie for everyone to watch. It is a movie that I believe children can watch as well as adults. It will encourage children to look inside at their own creativity as well as invite adults to find thiers. Every so often we are given a glimpse as to what may be, and it is up to us to find what is. Go on Facebook and search out "The John Searl Story" and you can join the facebook group for the movie itself. I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays from 5 to 8 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at www.wche1520.com You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom First Download- Kansas City, Missouri, USA Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: Cafe Broadcast on 05.22.09 Interview w/ Lee "Digger" Downs.
item.description: Here is the broadcast on May 22nd 2009 of The Paranormal Cafe. Rob welcomes Connie and Tony Jr. to the show with JT producing. In the first hour we discuss and review two well know movies of the paranormal field. Poltergeist, starring Craig T. Nelson is an iconic movie of it's time. The second movie is The Others, starring Nicole Kidman. A movie that has ghostly activity occur in families. In the second hour Rob interviews Lee "Digger" Downs, author of "The Funny Side Of Death" Lee discusses taboo subjects and sheds light on the death industry. Rob also discusses how he would like to be remembered. I hope you enjoy the show of the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays from 5 to 8 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at www.wche1520.com You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom First Download- Los Angeles, California, USA Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe broadcast 06.19.09 pt. 3 Interview w/ Karyn & Richard Dolan
item.description: Here is the third part of The Paranormal Cafe on June 19th 2009. Interview with Karyn & Richard Dolan. www.keyholepublishing.com ***We are posting this immediately due to the time sensitive information contained in the show. Many of the guests on the show will be presenting at Roswell New Mexico this 4th of July weekend and we wanted to get it on the podcast ASAP. We will be putting up the earlier shows after this one. Thanks for your understanding.*** Karyn and Richard come to us on the eve of the publishing of Richard's new book UFOs and the National Security State. Volume Two. Richard's first volume is by far a must-read and is a benchmark in UFO publications. Volume Two promises to be even better. Coving the cover-up from 1973-1991. Rob interviews them here in a snapshot before their appearences in Roswell this year. Karyn Dolan hosts the internet radio program "Through the Keyhole" Fridays, 8-10* pm EST Please feel free to attend both of their presentations in Roswell, July 2nd-5th. Let them know you heard them on The Paranormal Cafe. Host Notes: I appreciate Karyn and Richard coming on the show and sharing their upcoming talks with us. I really like having them both on because of the chemistry between them and the subject matter. I wanted to have them on longer and they have both agreed to be on after the publication of the new book. I am looking forward to it very much. Thank you very much Karyn and Richard. I hope you enjoy the 3rd part of the show and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM on Fridays from 5 to 8 pm. Eastern US time, and online stream at www.wche1520.com You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom First Download- Indianapolis, Indiana, USA Visit Rob on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe feel free to "friend" Rob on Facebook.

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe broadcast 05.08.09 pt. 3 Interview w/ Alexandra Holzer
item.description: The Paranormal Cafe welcomes Author, Columnist, and Paranormalist, Alexandra Holzer to the airwaves. www.hauntingholzer.com Alexandra Holzer is a member of organizations such as the SCBWI, Firstwriters.com, IMDBpro.com and Absolute Writers.com. Her father is the original ghost hunter, published Author Professor Hans Holzer, Ph.D of 146 titles in the genres of parapsychology, the supernatural, religion and healing and some fiction. He is most known for the adaptation of his book 'Murder in Amityville' for the film Amityville II: The Possession, Ghosts, America's Haunted House, The UFOnauts, The Journey of the Magi and Murder in Amityville: Fact or Fiction-a compilation of all three books he had written on the case. Holzer was recently inducted into Marquis Who's Who in America 2008 62nd Edition, following her father from the 70s. Her first title (Lady Ambrosia-Secret Past Revealed) had two field nomination's, one with Young Adult Literature by the ALA and another to the IHG (International Horror Guild.) Her mother is an accomplished artist, Countess on the Baron side to the Russian Buxhoeveden Family with relations to Catherine The Great. Their published family book is written in German entitled, 'Riga 1201 Buxhoeveden 2001.' Holzer's 98 year old Parisian grandmother, Rosine Claire (married to the count of Russia), has herself published 'French Gourmet Vegetarian', 'New French Gourmet Vegetarian' and 'French Vegetarian Cosmetics.' She studied at some of the best prep schools in New York City, including 'The Lycee Francais', 'The Fleming School' and 'The York Preparatory School.' In 1992, after graduating high school, she attended 'The Fashion Institute of Technology'(F.I.T), earning two degrees in Fine Arts and Advertising. Her mother also attended F.I.T. when Alexandra was a teen. It was here where Holzer became a self taught Graphic Designer working for small to big travel ad agencies. In 1999, she quit her job as a graphic designer for a conference publishing company and bravely left to begin her own freelance business naming it AHG Design. Alexandra Holzer's second book, 'Growing Up Haunted-A Ghostly Memoir' alongside her fathers newest title, 'Spirit Connection-How The Other Side Intervenes', have published as father and daughter for the first time under the same house. A rare haunting moment. 'Growing Up Haunted' is being read by a documentary filmmaker generating vast interest in it's story. She already knows who she would want to play her father. In the interim of the new book, Holzer had created her monthly column named 'Spirit Talk' for the Paranormal Awareness Society based in Florida who has a radio show and since then was picked up from UFO Digest.com based in Canada and at www.alienseekernews.com from the mid-west. While filming for New Wave Entertainment Production Company in April of '07 for the re-release of the film Poltergeist, she went on with her father as paranormal experts and authors released October 2007. Host notes: I wish Alexandra well with her recent passing of her Father. I enjoyed having Alexandra on, and wanted to focus more on her own work and perspectives in the field. She did well on the show and I think has established herself well. Best wishes Alexandra. Thanks Mom. First Download, Lawrence, Kansas, USA Visit me on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe broadcast 05.08.09 pt. 2 Interview w/ Dr. Raymond Moody
item.description: In this second part of this edition Rob interviews Dr. Raymond Moody. www.lifeafterlife.com He is the Best-Selling Author of eleven books including Life After Life—which has sold over 13 million copies world wide—and Reunions, as well as numerous articles in academic and professional literature. Dr. Moody continues to capture enormous public interest and generate controversy with his ground-breaking work on the near-death experience and what happens when we die. Dr. Moody has been a featured expert in the media. Dr Moody has appeared three times on Oprah, as well as on hundreds of other local and nationally syndicated programs such as MSNBC: Grief Recovery, NBC Today, ABC's Turning Point, Donahue, Sally Jessy Raphael Show, Geraldo, and The Joan Rivers Show. Dr. Moody is the leading authority on the 'near-death experience'—a phrase he coined in the late seventies. Dr. Moody's research into the phenomenon of near-death experience had its start in the 1960's. Host notes: I am very pleased to have Dr. Moody on the program and to present him to our listeners. He brings excellent conversation and expertise to the show. Thank you Dr. Moody, your always welcome here. Thanks Mom. First Download, Lannon, Wisconsin, USA Visit me on Facebook www.facebook.com/TheCafe

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe Discusses The Rendlesham Forest / Bentwaters UFO case. Second part of interview with Peter Robbins 04.24.09 pt 4 of 4
item.description: The Paranormal Cafe discusses one of the most documented UFO cases in history. The Rendlesham Forest / Bentwaters case. We interview Peter Robbins Co-author with Larry Warren of Left At East Gate and discuss parts of the case that are, and are not, so well known. Peter is an excellent interview and he also gives us great insight into Larry Warren and the military in the late 70's early 80's. I hope you enjoy the second part of the discussion and invite you to listen to all of our podcasts at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Listen to the shows live broadcast on WCHE 1520AM, and online stream at www.wche1520.com You can also email Rob at cafe@juno.com Thanks Mom

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe March 27th 2009 Pt 1 of 4
item.description: Here we are with The Paranormal Cafe on March 27th, 2009. Rob is in studio with Eric Heinrich. Eric is the original Co-Host of The Paranormal Cafe. We open the show discussing some articles and preparing to speak with Bob Gardner, Represenative from MUFON, Mutual Unidentified Flying Objects Network. We go from re-creating fragrances, to cloning, to UFO's. We talk briefly about Stephenville, to The Phoenix Lights. We discuss the article by Phil Patton, UFO Myths, A special investigation. We invite him on the air, no reply yet. We hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen live Fridays 5pm to 7pm Eastern US Time. Listen live streaming at www.wche1520.com I hope you enjoy and subscribe to the podcast. item.title: Conclusion of Dennis Hope's interview from The Lunar Embassy on The Paranormal Cafe March 20th 2009 Pt 3 of 4
item.description: Here is the second half of the interview with Dennis Hope of The Lunar Embassy. www.lunarembassy.com He talks about the creation of The Delta currency and the World Bank. Rob goes into some details about politicians and money. The World Monetary Fund is discussed along with how The Delta could benefit everyone. Host notes: I find it very interesting how Dennis discusses the moon and how it's very existence will benefit mankind. I think that NASA has dropped, and punted the ball when it comes to the moon. We have a natural resource that is completely untapped and has not been used for anything except propaganda. We as the human race must utilize the moon in order for us to have any hope of reaching the next level in our existence. Is the moon the next Middle East in resources? We hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen live Fridays 5pm to 7pm Eastern US Time. Listen live streaming at www.wche1520.com I hope you enjoy and subscribe to the podcast. Subscribe at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact Rob directly, as many have done, (yes he get emails now) at cafe@juno.com Download more episodes, become a fan of the show, and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com First Download - Toronto, Ontario, Canada

item.title: The Paranormal Cafe March 20th 2009 Pt 1 of 4
item.description: Here we have the beginning of The Paranormal Cafe on March 20th 2009 Pt1. We are visited by original Co-Host Eric Heinrich cousineric@hotmail.com We discuss many things which include our guest, in the second half hour, Dennis Hope of The Lunar Embassy www.lunarembassy.com We discuss the ideas behind The Lunar Embassy and the whole concept of owning land on the Moon! Rob and Eric dicuss ancient brewing techniques, and yeast that has been around for eons! You hear Eric talk about his doings and the whole concepts behind the brewing process. Is there a significant difference behind using yeast from ancient civilizations? Take a listen and find out! item.title: Conclusion of Friday The 13th Show on Paraskevidekatriaphobia! March 13th 2009- 4 of 4
item.description: Here is the conclusion of the famed Friday The 13th Show! Here we get to know some of the cast of characters in the studio with Rob. Rob's guests are Steve Pitner chezwold@juno.com, Barbara Selletti bselletti@gmail.com, Tony Selletti Sr. tony@aparanormalhistory.com, along with Anthony Selletti Jr. We discuss Barbara's continuing research on her books. That's correct she's working on several books as we speak. She explains why and how she is asking for the listeners help with this. She is asking those who research the paranormal, exactly why they became involved with this thankless effort in the first place. Barbara explains more in the podcast. Host notes- I am so proud to have The Paranormal Cafe return to the airwaves of WCHE 1520 West Chester Pa. I am excited to continue the tradition we have set of informative, interesting, and entertaining radio. I really believe that radio is a unique communication medium in that the interaction is key to a great show. I invite everyone to drop my guests in studio a line to let them know your listeneing. I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen live Fridays 5pm to 7pm Eastern US Time. Listen live streaming at www.wche1520.com I hope you enjoy and subscribe to the podcast. Subscribe at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact Rob directly, as many have done, (yes he get emails now) at cafe@juno.com Download more episodes, become a fan of the show, and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com First Download- Phoenix, Arizona. USA

item.title: Second part of interview with Dr .Donald Dossey about Phobias March 13th 2009- 3 of 4
item.description: This is the second part of a two part interview conducted with Dr. Donald Dossey, www.drdossey.com regarding Phobias. Specifically in regards to Friday The 13th! It's Paraskevidekatriaphobia! He stops by the Cafe to welcome Rob back on the air and to have frank discussions about phobias. Hear Rob disclose some his own phobias and how they have affected him. His fears may surprise you. The solutions may surprise you as well. Dr. Dossey also delves into Post Tramatic Stress Disorder, PTSD, and explains how those with this condition can no longer function normally, and how the wrong cure can be disasterous! Host Notes: Dr. Dossey is an excellent speaker and brings a mix of Marcus Welby MD., along with humor, and compassion to a subject we understand very little about. I appreciate his candidness, along with his passion, in talking about the seriousness of this condition. If you enjoy this interview please let Dr. Dossey know by emailing him at drdossey@drdossey.com I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen live Fridays 5pm to 7pm Eastern US Time. Listen live streaming at www.wche1520.com I hope you enjoy and subscribe to the podcast. Subscribe at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact Rob directly, as many have done, (yes he get emails now) at cafe@juno.com Download more episodes, become a fan of the show, and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com First Download- Potomac, Maryland USA

Dr. Dossey also delves into Post Tramatic Stress Disorder, PTSD, and explains how those with this condition can no longer function normally, and how the wrong cure can be disasterous! Host Notes: Dr. Dossey is an excellent speaker and brings a mix of Marcus Welby MD., along with humor, and compassion to a subject we understand very little about. I appreciate his candidness, along with his passion, in talking about the seriousness of this condition. If you enjoy this interview please let Dr. Dossey know by emailing him at drdossey@drdossey.com I hope you enjoy the show and invite you to listen live Fridays 5pm to 7pm Eastern US Time. item.title: The Return of The Paranormal Cafe! March 13th 2009 1of4
item.description: The Paranormal Cafe returns to the airwaves of WCHE 1520 www.wche1520.com where it began in 2005! Rob brings friends of the show on and discusses a little of the history of his guests and himself. Rob's guests are Steve Pitner chezwold@juno.com, Barbara Selletti bselletti@gmail.com, Tony Selletti Sr. tony@aparanormalhistory.com, along with Anthony Selletti Jr. Rob welcomes all the listeners back and invites us to take part in the drive to Save Fort Mifflin, www.fortmifflin.us. It's the first part of four for the date. Hear the return to the airwaves for yourself. Host notes- I am so proud to have The Paranormal Cafe return to the airwaves of WCHE 1520 West Chester Pa. I am excited to continue the tradition we have set of informative, interesting, and entertaining radio. I really believe that radio is a unique communication medium in that the interaction is key to a great show. item.title: The Paranormal Cafe Returns to WCHE 1520AM.
item.description: I am very happy to announce that The Paranormal Cafe is coming back to the place where it began, WCHE 1520 AM Studios in West Chester, Pennsylvania. On Friday March 13th, 2009, from 5pm. to 7pm. Eastern US time. We have been invited to continue the show that has continued to show that there IS a Cafe for the mind. Due to the fans showing their support on WCHE's Jay & Randy show, the station was very happy to have us broadcasting again. So back at it we go, bringing you The Paranormal Cafe you know and love. I greatly appreciate WCHE for doing so and want to thank all the fans that showed their support as well. The Emails, the calls, and the outpouring of support for the show really took me by surprise. The end result is a forum for us all to enjoy topics that most places are too afraid to go. Be sure to tune in live via their live internet stream at www.wche1520.com click on "Listen Live" button and there you go. We will be taking calls at 610.692.3131. We have booked guests and will be having more cutting edge topics to discuss. I invite everyone to listen and invite your friends to listen as well. After all, the more, the better. Many have asked what they can do to help the show. One way is to drop the station emails. This lets them know you care and also lets them know your listening, and it's free. The email address are below. Feel free to include them all in your emails. jay@wche1520.com Jay Shur - Owner bill@wche1520.com Bill Mason - General Manager randy@wche1520.com Randy Dascher - Music Director Again, I thank everyone for their support and look forward to seeing everyone at The Cafe. I invite everyone to listen and invite your friends to listen as well. After all, the more, the better. Thanks Mom. Robert Simcox Host - The Paranormal Cafe WCHE 1520AM West Chester-Philadelphia Station Website: www.wche1520.com streaming LIVE! Show Website: www.theparanormalcafe.com Show Podcasts: www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com Rob's Email cafe@juno.com Listen. Talk. Wonder.

item.title: Interview with Celebrity Numerologist Tania Gabrielle Pt.2
item.description: Tania Gabrielle stops into The Paranormal Cafe to discuss Numerology and to discuss how these play into everyday life. From the famous, Ron Paul, to the Obscure, Robert Simcox. Tania covers it all. Listen to Rob's ego get inflated with references to Genius! That's right Genius and Rob in the same sentence! Tania also discusses key dates in Ufology and our country's history! Visit her site at www.taniagabrielle.com and see what adds up in numerology. Host Notes: I loved having Tania in the Cafe! She brings electricity and personality in and I could talk about for hours. Thank you Tania for your insight and expertise. Thanks Mom! also goto http://www.wche1520.com/paranormalcafe.htm If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me directly, as many have done, (yes I get emails now) at cafe@juno.com Download more episodes, become a fan of the show, and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com First Download- Middleburg, Florida USA

item.title: Daniel Estulin stops by The Paranormal Cafe to Discuss The Bilderburg Group! pt 3
item.description: This part 3 of 3 interview February 10th 2008. What in the world is The Bilderburg Group? As Daniel Points out it is a shadow group that meets anually in secret, (or as secret as Daniel and Alex Jones lets them) to discuss world policies and planned events for their own benefit. Go to Daniels Site www.danielestulin.com There you can get the book that is discussed and catch up on the latest work he has done. He has predictions, in which he has been 90% accurate on, displayed on his site. Drop him a line and let him know you heard him here. Host Notes. Daniel is a great guest to have on. He is well educated and well researched. I consider it a pleasure to have him on. Thanks Mom! If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me directly, as many have done, (yes I get emails now) at cafe@juno.com Download more episodes and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com First Download From Hacienda Heights, Blazing Star Dr. California, USA.

item.title: Interview w/ Peter Lemesurier about Nostradamus and his Prophecies. 01-12-07 2nd hour.
item.description: Here is the second hour of 01-12-07 where Rob interviews Peter Lemesurier regarding his extensive work on Nostradamus and his Prophecies. Visit his website at www.notradamus500.com Peter explains his research and his conclusions and invites the listener to do the same. With over 500 years since Nostradamus's death, he still remains as an icon and an enigma for us today. Host Notes: I like this interview first because it was done in the WCHE studios. Secondly because of Peter's attitude towards the subject. He invites you to make up your own mind and research for yourself. It is a refreshing interview and I wish to thank him for coming on the show (even through a scheduling error) and speaking with us. Let him know you heard the interview and what you thought. If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me directly, as many have done, (yes I get emails now) at cafe@juno.com Download more episodes and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com

item.title: Time Traveler - John Titor! Interview with Oliver Williams Part 2
item.description: Here is the second part of the interview with Oliver Williams about his website. www.johntitor.com It's all about the famed time traveller John Titor! John is a self-proclaimed time traveller who stopped in our time in 2001 enroute to 2036. His travels take him from 2036 to 1975 to pursue a IBM 5100 computer, of all things. Oliver discusses why and his involvement and brings us up to speed with the case of John Titor. He also gives us his take on the whole case and lets us know how CERN is involved. This part two of the series is offered here courtesy of Kurt and Kelli in Kansas. Thanks guys for the help. Always looking for my older podcasts. Download more episodes and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com

item.title: Dr Lynne Kitei visits The Paranormal Cafe to discuss The Phoenix Lights. pt 3 of 3
item.description: Dr. Lynne Kitei visits Rob Simcox at The Paranormal Cafe to chat about one of the most widely debated sightings in history, The Phoenix Lights. She begins the discussion by reviewing unusual activity which started months prior to the "mass sighting". She has produced an excellent book and documentary on this and you can visit her site at www.thephoenixlights.net. Here you can watch clips, discuss the movie, or purchase a high resolution DVD. Thank you Lynne for coming to The Paranormal Cafe. Host Notes- This interview has never been broadcast in it's entirety. Please enjoy this epidsode. Thanks, Rob Questions, Comments email Rob directly cafe@juno.com Download more episodes and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com

Thanks, Rob Questions, Comments email Rob directly cafe@juno.com length 21min. 44sec. Download more episodes and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com

item.title: Dr Lynne Kitei visits The Paranormal Cafe to discuss The Phoenix Lights. pt 1 of 3
item.description: Dr. Lynne Kitei visits Rob Simcox at The Paranormal Cafe to chat about one of the most widely debated sightings in history, The Phoenix Lights. She begins the discussion by reviewing unusual activity which started months prior to the "mass sighting". She has produced an excellent documentary on this and you can visit her site at www.thephoenixlights.net. Here you can watch clips, discuss the movie, or purchase a high resolution DVD. Thank you Lynne for coming to The Paranormal Cafe. Host Notes- This interview has never been broadcast in it's entirety. Please enjoy this epidsode. Thanks, Rob Download more episodes and even subscribe for the podcast at www.theparanormalcafe.podomatic.com

item.title: 11-30-06 Alex Jones visits The Paranormal Cafe.
item.description: Our guest on The Paranormal Cafe is the one and only Alex Jones. He comes on the show being shot out of a cannon. Alex covers the current conspiracy of 9-11 and outlines how he "Called The Shot" Alex's site www.infowars.com Alex's facts are many and he gives MANY sites to visit for you to verify. Host Notes- I love having Alex on the show. He is an "In Your Face" type of reporter. Alex brings energy and, to my amazement, WANTS people to Pirate his material. Alex invites you to make up your own mind and do so before it is too late. Thank you Mr. Jones for the time you spent here at The Paranormal Cafe. Any questions-comments? email Rob directly at cafe@juno.com
